doc.title: All Present in the Universe of Guns
doc.plot: All Present in the Universe of Guns is a plea to President Bush, or any succeeding President, not to launch nuclear weapons against Iran. This plea is made by the narrator, Kari Ann Owen, against the background of the horseback riding program for abled and disabled riders she directs in the hope that the beauty and fragility of the natural environment and its people and animals will move hearts inclined to war.
